snippet: When China rejuvenates its top leadership team toward the end of the year, sources close to senior leaders say President Xi Jinping could reveal his grip on power with a possible leapfrog promotion for Guizhou Communist Party boss Chen Miner....

headline.main: Fun-Loving South African Golfer Hobday Dies at 76
headline.print_headline: Fun-Loving South African Golfer Hobday Dies at 76

lead_paragraph: When China rejuvenates its top leadership team toward the end of the year, sources close to senior leaders say President Xi Jinping could reveal his grip on power with a possible leapfrog promotion for Guizhou Communist Party boss Chen Miner.
